issue.title: [C++] Disambiguate function calls in csv parser test
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7099](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7099). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
cpp/src/arrow/csv/parser_test.cc has calls to overloaded functions which cannot be disambiguated. see https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5727

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7099?focusedCommentId=16970140) by Francois Saint-Jacques (fsaintjacques):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5791
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5791>
